SRP.A: The peak of  Peer-to-Peer Lending is to the {right} of the peak of Venture Capital.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Real Estate or Venture Capital?
NC.A: {Real Estate} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Bonds or Peer-to-Peer Lending?
NC.A: {Peer-to-Peer Lending} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Venture Capital or Real Estate?
NC.A: {Real Estate} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Peer-to-Peer Lending or Real Estate?
NC.A: {Peer-to-Peer Lending} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {2} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Stock Market}
